sentences.english: Does not my son left leg tibiofibula fracture 9 months heal?
sentences.chinese: 我儿子左腿胫腓骨骨折9个月还没有愈合？

sentences.english: Objective To probe the enlargement of using range of vascularized fibular transferring.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索扩大吻合血管腓骨移植修复骨缺损的范围。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of tibiofibular fracture treated by combined fixation technic.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨结合固定治疗胫腓骨骨折的疗效。

sentences.english: To reconstruct the osseous defect, we prefer the fibula as the emphasis is on compression strength.
sentences.chinese: 为重建骨性缺损，我们更喜欢用腓骨作为抗压的重点。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a bended intramedullary nail and its effect on treating tibiofibular fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍折弯髓内钉治疗胫腓骨骨折的方法与疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To conclude the method and experience of reconstruction of Achilles tendon rupture with peroneus longus tendon transfer.
sentences.chinese: 目的腓骨长肌腱转移修复跟腱断裂的手术和经验。

sentences.english: He stumbled when playing on the field and injured his fibula.
sentences.chinese: 他打球的时候摔了一跤，腓骨骨折了。

sentences.english: Conclusion The third peroneus flap can be grafted.
sentences.chinese: 结论第三腓骨肌可以移植。

sentences.english: The branches from the peroneal artery to the distal fibula are arcuate arteries.
sentences.chinese: 腓动脉至腓骨下段的分支为弓形动脉。

sentences.english: Restoration of the fibular length was important to prevent talar shift and tilt.
sentences.chinese: 恢复腓骨的长度对防止距骨移位与倾斜十分重要。

sentences.english: We normally use double- or triple-barrel fibula grafts.
sentences.chinese: 我们通常使用两个或三个管状腓骨移植物。

sentences.english: Curative effect is satisfactory on the treatment of chronic peroneal tendon subluxation by operation means.
sentences.chinese: 手术方法治疗慢性腓骨肌腱滑脱症效果满意。

sentences.english: Mullins was born without fibula bones and was expected to use a wheelchair to get around.
sentences.chinese: 马林斯生来就没有腓骨，原本必须在轮椅上才能活动。

sentences.english: It is the fibula in the ankle that has to be checked, that is what I have been told.
sentences.chinese: 据我所知，他踝关节附近的腓骨需要进一步的检查。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effects of three fixations for open tibiofibula fractures.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较开放性胫腓骨骨折三种不同固定方法的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the treatment method of tibiofibular fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胫腓骨粉碎骨折的治疗方法。

definition: to suffer a fracture/(of a bone) to break/fracture
ilium (the large flat bone of the pelvic girdle)
